Articles.Content:
Hi all, i really don`t want to plug shamelessly "THE DUNATIAN" in general discussion, but i think one or another newer member might find here a funny task while we all gently coast together towards KSP2...

If you have allready played "THE DUNATIAN", leave a comment or rant... no shame about it, this is serious space adventure!

I think Bob`s destiny deserves your attention if you haven`t discovered it yet!

Hitting 10`000 downloads would be awesum!

Thanks to all the players who tried their skills!
Shame on your shameless plug, Mikki.
Congratulations on your success, but please don't make a thread in one subforum just to call attention to a thread in another subforum.
